data.title: EVENTS
questions: What opportunities did you have (this week) to demonstrate leadership?
How did you handle specific situations or challenges?
What went well? What would you have done differently?
What do you take-away from your experiences?

data.title: INSIGHTS
questions: What was personally significant for you (during the week)?
What did you learn about yourself? How will you take that forward?
What did you learn about your boss? Your peers? Your team?
What insights/a-haâ€™s do you want to share with your leader/team?

data.title: VALUES + NEEDS
questions: In what specific ways did you demonstrate your values?
What value(s) do you want to emphasize going forward? How will you?
What are you intentionally doing to build trust, rapport and relationships?
Who do you need to thank, recognize or reward? By when?

data.title: GOALS + PROGRESS
questions: What progress did you make toward your leadership development goal(s)?
What leadership challenge(s) do you foresee (this coming week)?
How can you better manage yourself/prepare for these challenges?
What goal/skill will you intentionally work on (this coming week)?
